abstract: Since its launch, Google’s Street View service has captured a number of odd images, but perhaps nothing quite as out-of-this-world as the mystical glow illuminating one block in Brooklyn.
snippet: Since its launch, Google’s Street View service has captured a number of odd images, but perhaps nothing quite as out-of-this-world as the mystical glow illuminating one block in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:17 p.m.  Response from Google included below.

headline.main: Has Google Found a Stairway to Heaven in Brooklyn?
